title: Excellence in Theatre Arts Endowed Scholarship Fund
description: To provide scholarship awards, which may include research-related expenses, for students involved in dance or theatre within the Department of Visual and Performing Arts at UCCS.  Recipients will have a minimum GPA of at least 3.0.
marketingContent: To provide scholarship awards, which may include research-related expenses, for students involved in dance or theatre within the Department of Visual and Performing Arts at UCCS. Recipients will have a minimum GPA of at least 3.0.
